sentences.sContent: They are busy carrying food, but the ant colony and egoistic.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are busy carrying food, but the ant colony and egoistic.
sentences.sCn: 它们忙着搬食物，但蚁群里也有自私自利的家伙。

sentences.sContent: Over, egoistic man, a penny more than pan big man, the world will let the man be cast into the shade.
sentences.sContent_eng: Over, egoistic man, a penny more than pan big man, the world will let the man be cast into the shade.
sentences.sCn: 斤斤计较、自私自利的男人，一个铜板看得比磨盘大的男人，会让男人世界黯然失色。

sentences.sContent: Choose friends must be careful! Pure egoistic, will put on the mask of friendship, but also set a trap to hang you.
sentences.sContent_eng: Choose friends must be careful! Pure egoistic, will put on the mask of friendship, but also set a trap to hang you.
sentences.sCn: 选择朋友一定要谨慎！地道的自私自利，会戴上友谊的假面具，却又设好陷阱来坑你。

synos.tran: 自私自利的，自我中心的

words.tran: 自私自利的；自我中心的；利已主义的
自我主义者；利己主义者

trans.tranCn: 自我中心的， 自私自利的
